text: {"grade": 0, "reasoning": "The criterion specifically asks about clarifying occupancy/vacancy risks, such as tenants or rights of first refusal. The candidate answer focuses heavily on financial costs, legal compliance (urbanistic conformity, liens), and procedural steps (notary, geometra). It does not explicitly mention or clarify risks related to existing tenants (locazione) or the seller's obligation to clear any rights of first refusal (diritto di prelazione) before the final deed, which are critical occupancy/vacancy risks associated with the property itself.", "criterion_id": "41f7cc48-7d35-45ac-b56a-eb97853b50c0"}
